info.+content: Lupin III vs. Detective Conan The Movie
Lupin III vs. Detective Conan: La película
Lupin III vs. Detetive Conan: O Filme
Lupin Sansei vs Meitantei Conan THE MOVIE
Lupin Terzo vs. Detective Conan: Il film
Lupin the 3rd vs. Detektiv Conan: The Movie
ルパン三世 vs 名探偵コナン THE MOVIE
魯邦三世 VS 名偵探柯南 THE MOVIE

Conan's attempt to stop Kid from stealing another jewel brought him face-to-face with Lupin and his gang. Meanwhile, Emilio Baretti, a famous Italian singer arrived in Japan with his entourage for a concert that is in danger of being cancelled because of an anonymous threat. As the cases come together, Conan has to solve the underlying cause of unwanted developments unfolding after their arrival.
#1: "Theme from Lupin the Third - 2013 with Conan Ending ver." by Yuji Ohno
#2: "Detective Conan Main Theme (Lupin the Third vs Detective Conan version)" by Katsuo Ono
